channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lawsuit challenges the approval of an exploratory drilling program in Alaska
item.description: A new lawsuit seeks to overturn the recent approval of an exploratory drilling program in the National Petroleum Reserve-Alaska

item.title: Abrego Garcia won release from detention. He must check in with immigration officials 14 hours later
Vaccine vote signals turbulence for immunization policy, public trust
item.description: Clinicians and epidemiologists warn the decision could unravel decades of progress and expose newborns to a deadly, preventable disease.

item.title: WATCH: Stranded father, son rescued from Everglades
item.description: The pair were rescued by helicopter after their ATV became stuck in mud.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia leaves ICE detention after judge ordered release
item.description: A federal judge in Maryland on Thursday ordered Kilmar Abrego Garcia's immediate release from Immigration and Customs Enforcement custody.
